item.title: 2.5 DNS
item.description: State/Version: Draft 2.5 DNS 2.5.1 Deploy and configure bind9 2.5 DNS This lab uses it’s own name servers. Provision the containers via Proxmox template. Install and configure bind9 using Ansible playbook. 2.5.1 Deploy and configure bind9 Deploy via Ansible (Semaphore) playbook https://github.com/gerundium/ansible/blob/main/bind9.yml
